name: Ludum Dare 47: Time Loop
description:
Time Loop

My first Ludum Dare Game Jam Game about moving in a loop and shooting bad guys. This is my first game I've completed so please give feedback!

Link to rate: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/time-loop

Edit: Fixed some last second bugs
- Difficulty broke so thats fixed
- Opens to main menu now
- Fixed the guns shooting weird

Controls

MoveWASD
Shoot/Aim Left Mouse Button/ Move Mouse
